<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file defines the pass that performs some optimizations with LEA</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions in order to improve performance and code size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently, it does two things:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) If there are two LEA instructions calculating addresses which only differ</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    by displacement inside a basic block, one of them is removed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2) Address calculations in load and store instructions are replaced by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    existing LEA def registers where possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Both instructions must be in the same basic block and they must be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Instructions are in different basic blocks&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(InstrPos.contains(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>) &amp;&amp; InstrPos.contains(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InstrPos&#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>&#93; - InstrPos&#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the best LEA instruction in the List to replace address recalculation in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MI. Such LEA must meet these requirements:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) The address calculated by the LEA differs only by the displacement from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    the address used in MI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2) The register class of the definition of the LEA is compatible with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    register class of the address base register of MI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3) Displacement of the new memory operand should fit in 1 byte if possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 4) The LEA should be as close to MI as possible, and prior to it if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> X86OptimizeLEAPass::chooseBestLEA(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MachineInstr &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;List, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;BestLEA, int64&#95;t &amp;AddrDispShift, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Dist) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &#42;MF = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc">MCInstrDesc</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getDesc();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MemOpNo = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#ad571a5a542b484586224d3a8df631646">X86II::getMemoryOperandNo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a>.TSFlags) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">                <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86ii/#af0baab1b1dfea49cbffeb8727aebd429">X86II::getOperandBias</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">  BestLEA = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Loop over all LEA instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a> : List) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get new address displacement.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t AddrDispShiftTemp = getAddrDispShift(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, MemOpNo, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a>, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure address displacement fits 4 bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;32&gt;</a>(AddrDispShiftTemp))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check that LEA def register can be used as MI address base. Some</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions can use a limited set of registers as address base, for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// example MOV8mr&#95;NOREX. We could constrain the register class of the LEA</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// def to suit MI, however since this case is very rare and hard to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reproduce in a test it&#39;s just more reliable to skip the LEA.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getRegClass(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a>, MemOpNo + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86/#a2a5aec578e2e391e99e1705012752d84a319f0e99a1ac9396659683d2638d4f45">X86::AddrBaseReg</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>, &#42;MF) !=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;getRegClass(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a>-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Choose the closest LEA instruction from the list, prior to MI if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// possible. Note that we took into account resulting address displacement</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as well. Also note that the list is sorted by the order in which the LEAs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// occur, so the break condition is pretty simple.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DistTemp = calcInstrDist(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DistTemp != 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;The distance between two different instructions cannot be zero&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DistTemp &gt; 0 || BestLEA == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not update return LEA, if the current one provides a displacement</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which fits in 1 byte, while the new candidate does not.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BestLEA != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;8&gt;</a>(AddrDispShiftTemp) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;8&gt;</a>(AddrDispShift))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">      BestLEA = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">      AddrDispShift = AddrDispShiftTemp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">      Dist = DistTemp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: Maybe we should not always stop at the first LEA after MI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DistTemp &lt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BestLEA != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the difference between the addresses&#39; displacements of the two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions \\p MI1 and \\p MI2. The numbers of the first memory operands are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// passed through \\p N1 and \\p N2.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) Addresses calculated by LEAs differ only by displacement.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Assign the position number to the instruction. Note that we are going to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// move some instructions during the optimization however there will never</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be a need to move two instructions before any selected instruction. So to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// avoid multiple positions&#39; updates during moves we just increase position</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// counter by two leaving a free space for instructions which will be moved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">    InstrPos&#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>&#93; = Pos += 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
